results.title: Chronic blockade of angiotensin II action prevents glomerulosclerosis, but induces graft vasculopathy in experimental kidney transplantation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ or @CHEMICAL_L_158809 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C070967 @@@L158,809@@@ treatment in allografts starting at day 10 after transplantation completely prevented this, with the exception of @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases_Interstitial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017563 @@@interstitial damage@@@, but this treatment also caused a reduction in blood pressure and renal function.

citations.NLM: Smit-van Oosten A, Navis G, Stegeman CA, Joles JA, Klok PA, Kuipers F, Tiebosch AT, van Goor H. Chronic blockade of angiotensin II action prevents glomerulosclerosis, but induces graft vasculopathy in experimental kidney transplantation. J Pathol. 2001 May;194(1):122-9. PMID: 11329151
